item.title: Tracking Down the Bulgarian Marketplace Scams
item.description: Introduction This is rather an unusual article that I would be publishing. I usually don’t do threat hunting or any amount of hunting outside work, but this one got personal. This is probably a good place to state that this is not related to my work activities and that I am doing this of my own accord! Research Let’s start from the beginning. A little while ago, I was contacted by a person in a marketplace for an item that I was selling.
